message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within a budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $13,000. I'd be willing to go up to $12,500. Can we meet at this price?
